Name: First Time in Rome
About the game: Kate Robinson's Hidden Object adventure continues! When work takes the amateur travel blogger and her daughter to Rome, the pair must work harder than ever to discover what actually makes this historic city so beautiful! Explore intricately-designed Hidden Object locations! Help Kate make Bellissima Roma Great again! Uncover Rome's true beauty through over 30 different minigames! Replay beautiful locations in Unlimited Mode! Unlock achievements by playing through the game! Comes with downloadable wallpapers and the full soundtrack!
